Help: Press the key once to look and again to go.
u         Use the item in your hand
t         Take or put away an item into inventory (also supports # and name)
t #       Take an item by number
t [name]  Take an item by name
d         Drop an item (also supports # and name)
h         Describe what's in your hand

Locations.Name: Home
Locations.Description: You're home. It's cozy and safe here.

Directions.Description: A small bed is neatly made. Some books sit on a shelf beside it.
The large wooden front door is closed.
There is a window with a heavy curtain, partially opened. Its dark outside.
A wooden chest sits by a small table. A candle dimly lights the room.

Locations.Name: Home: Front Yard
Locations.Description: The front yard is well groomed. Soft grass is lightly covered in dew. A large oak tree looms over the house.

Directions.Description: The small home has a large wooden door that's rounded at the top. It's closed.
Past the tree, a dirt road heads East to West.
The side yard East of the house is unmowed. Tall grasses and bushes.
The side yard East of the house leads to a forest of small trees.

Interactions.Description: You attempt to pet the wolf. It lunges and grabs your hand it its mouth, severely injuring your hand.
You drop the bread and step back. The wolf carefully approaches, eats the bread and looks at you with kind eyes.
You lunge at the wolf with your dagger and slit its throat. The wolf dies before it has a chance to retaliate.

Locations.Name: Home: Chest
Locations.Description: You open the chest to find a dagger and an old tattered book.

Directions.Description: You're looking towards the center of the room.

Inventory.Name: Book
Inventory.Description: The book appears to be very old and inscribed by hand in an unfamiliar alphabet.

Inventory.Name: Dagger
Inventory.Description: The dagger is about 10 inches long and very sharp.
